ABILITY_TEXT: Give a unit at a battlefield or a gear [Temporary]. (Kill it at the start of its controller's Beginning Phase, before scoring.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: You too shall pass.

ABILITY_TEXT: Exhaust: Return another friendly gear, unit, or [Hidden] card to its owner's hand.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "I know I put it in here somewhere..." -Teemo

ABILITY_TEXT: When this is played, discarded, or killed, draw 1.
FLAVOR_TEXT: The parts that make it to the heap are the ones that DIDN'T blow up.

ABILITY_TEXT: [Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.) Look at the top 3 cards of your Main Deck. Put 1 into your hand and recycle the rest.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "Just lucky, I guess."

ABILITY_TEXT: 1 Mana, Exhaust: Move a friendly unit at a battlefield to its base.
FLAVOR_TEXT: Without a ship, a pirate's just another common criminal.

ABILITY_TEXT: When I move, discard 1, then draw 1.
FLAVOR_TEXT: Payment first, refund never.

ABILITY_TEXT: When this leaves the board, draw 1 and channel 1 rune exhausted. 1 Chaos, Exhaust: Kill this.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "We're gonna be rich!" -Common last words

ABILITY_TEXT: Starting with the next player, each player may return a unit to its owner's hand.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "The storm approaches." -Janna

ABILITY_TEXT: When you play me, return another unit at a battlefield to its owner's hand.
FLAVOR_TEXT: If he had things his way, NOBODY would get in.

ABILITY_TEXT: [Ganking] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.) If I have moved twice this turn, I don't take damage.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "I will survive eternity. They will die today."

ABILITY_TEXT: [Deathknell] - Deal 4 to all units at my battlefield. (When I die, get the effect.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: "Oblivion come."

ABILITY_TEXT: [Tank] (I must be assigned combat damage first.) When you play me, move a unit from a battlefield to its base.
FLAVOR_TEXT: They know no fear. Nor much of anything else, really.

ABILITY_TEXT: When you play me, choose an opponent. They reveal their hand. Choose a card from it, and they discard that card.
FLAVOR_TEXT: Its victims go mad deciding which half to run from first.

ABILITY_TEXT: You may play me to an open battlefield. Friendly units may be played to open battlefields.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "I always shoot first."

ABILITY_TEXT: [Ganking] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.) When you look at cards from the top of your deck (and don't draw them) and see me, you may play me for.
I cost 1 Power less for each card in your trash.
FLAVOR_TEXT: It feeds well on death, but better on madness.

ABILITY_TEXT: When you play me, you may play a unit from your trash, ignoring its Energy cost. (You must still pay its Power cost.)
[Hidden] (Hide now for to react with later for 0 Power.) When you play me, give me +3 Might this turn.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "Reporting in!"

ABILITY_TEXT: Play a unit from your trash, ignoring its Energy cost. (You must still pay its Power cost.)
[Hidden] (Hide now for to react with later for 0 Power.) When you play me, you may choose a unit you control. Move me to its location and it to my original location.

When I attack, reveal the top rune of your rune deck, then recycle it. Do one of the following based on its domain: 1 Fury - Deal 2 to an enemy unit here and 1 to all other enemy units here. 1 Mind - Draw 1. 1 Order - Stun an enemy unit.
Each player discards their hand, then draws 4.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "Good a time as any to act reckless." -Ekko

ABILITY_TEXT: When you discard one or more cards, ready me and give me +1 Might this turn.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "Rules are meant to be broken. Like buildings! Or people."

ABILITY_TEXT: [Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.) Choose an enemy unit at a battlefield. Take control of it and recall it. (Send it to your base. This isn't a move.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: Some have a change of heart. Others need you to change it for them.

ABILITY_TEXT: Exhaust: [Reaction] - [Add] 1 Chaos. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)
[Ganking] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.) The third time I move in a turn, you score 1 point.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "I will follow this path until the end."

ABILITY_TEXT: [Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.) Give two friendly units each +2 Might this turn.
FLAVOR_TEXT: Fight together or die alone.

ABILITY_TEXT: [Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.) As you play this, you may spend a buff as an additional cost. If you do, ignore this spell's cost. Give a unit +3 Might this turn.
As an additional cost to play me, kill a friendly unit.
FLAVOR_TEXT: Fealty is a duty, not a choice.

ABILITY_TEXT: Each player kills one of their units.
FLAVOR_TEXT: What good is having a plank if nobody ever walks it?

ABILITY_TEXT: [Assault] (+1 Might while I'm an attacker.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: Don't worry, they love it.

ABILITY_TEXT: When you play me, play a 1 Might Recruit unit token here.
FLAVOR_TEXT: Hard work is its own reward.

ABILITY_TEXT: When you play this, play a 1 Might Recruit unit token at your base. Kill this: Recycle up to 4 cards from trashes.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "What else do we make? Beats me, but we do it better than anyone else."

ABILITY_TEXT: [Hidden] (Hide now for to react with later for 0 Power.) [Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.) Kill a unit at a battlefield. Its controller draws 2.
FLAVOR_TEXT: Not every Noxian decree is read aloud.

ABILITY_TEXT: [Assault] (+1 Might while I'm an attacker.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: Cross him and you'll learn just how petty he can be.

ABILITY_TEXT: [Deathknell] - Channel 1 rune exhausted. (When I die, get the effect.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: "Show us a path!" -Ashe

ABILITY_TEXT: [Legion] - When you play me, buff me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 buff. Get the effect if you've played another card this turn.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: War demands your life but offers immortality.

ABILITY_TEXT: [Legion] - When you play me, play two 1 Might Recruit unit tokens here. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: "Soldiers, to me!"
He knew his orders: hold the line, or there would be nothing left to hold.

ABILITY_TEXT: [Hidden] (Hide now for to react with later for 0 Power.) [Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.) Stun a friendly unit and an enemy unit at the same battlefield. (They don't deal combat damage this turn.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: "Play nice!" -Sett

ABILITY_TEXT: [Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.) When any unit takes damage this turn, kill it.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "With a word, I end you." -Azir

ABILITY_TEXT: When I move to a battlefield, play a 1 Might Recruit unit token here. (It is also at the battlefield.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: Even the Legion's musicians are hard to beat.

ABILITY_TEXT: When you play me, buff me. Then, if I am at a battlefield, buff all other friendly units there. (To buff a unit, give it a +1 Might buff if it doesn't already have one.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: Mount Targon's blessing is bestowed upon those who have proven they are strong enough without it.

ABILITY_TEXT: [Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.) You may kill a gear. Draw 1.
FLAVOR_TEXT: One person's treasure is another one's trash.

ABILITY_TEXT: When you play me, choose an enemy unit. If it is stunned, kill it. Otherwise, stun it. (It doesn't deal combat damage this turn.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: The sun has many rays, each tasked with driving out the darkness.

ABILITY_TEXT: When you play me, you may play a unit costing no more than 3 Power and no more than 1 from your trash, ignoring its cost.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "Come- there is use for you yet."

ABILITY_TEXT: If a combat where you are the attacker ends in a tie, recall ALL units instead. (Send them to base. This isn't a move. Ties are calculated after combat damage is dealt.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: "Next time, try to leave a dent!" -Leona

ABILITY_TEXT: When a buffed friendly unit dies, buff another friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 Might buff.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: Vanguard soldiers share both a helm and a vision.

ABILITY_TEXT: Kill a unit.
FLAVOR_TEXT: A brief moment of turmoil- then peace.

ABILITY_TEXT: When you play me, spend any number of buffs. For each buff spent, channel 1 rune exhausted.
FLAVOR_TEXT: In Piltover, the best way to become a great inventor is to find a great investor.

ABILITY_TEXT: As you play me, you may kill any number of friendly units as an additional cost. Reduce my cost by 1 Order for each killed this way [Deflect] (Opponents must pay to choose me with a spell or ability.) [Ganking] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
While I'm [Mighty], I have [Deflect], [Ganking], and [Shield]. (I'm Mighty while I have 5+ Might.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: "I long for a worthy opponent."

ABILITY_TEXT: [Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.) Give friendly units +5 Might this turn.
FLAVOR_TEXT: You need not understand the plan- only believe in it.

ABILITY_TEXT: When you play me, kill an enemy unit.
FLAVOR_TEXT: What bends a dragon's will is not strength, but sense of purpose.

ABILITY_TEXT: [Vision] (When you play me, look at the top card of your Main Deck. You may recycle it.) When you recycle one or more cards, buff a friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 buff. Runes aren't cards.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: "Heart and mind as one."

ABILITY_TEXT: Your [Deathknell] effects trigger an additional time.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "We all have a place among the divine. We only have to accept it."

ABILITY_TEXT: Starting with the next player, each other player chooses a unit you don't control that hasn't been chosen for this spell. Kill those units.
FLAVOR_TEXT: Ruling is about making hard choices. Serving is about living with the consequences.

ABILITY_TEXT: [Shield] (+1 Might while I'm a defender.) When I attack, stun an enemy unit here. (It doesn't deal combat damage this turn.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: "First light approaches."

ABILITY_TEXT: [Deathknell] - Play three 1 Might Recruit unit tokens into your base. (When I die, get the effect.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: The future is built by those who never see it.

ABILITY_TEXT: [Tank] (I must be assigned combat damage first.) I get +1 Might for each buffed friendly unit at my battlefield.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "Bein' the boss is a lot better than not bein' the boss."

ABILITY_TEXT: [Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve, including to a battlefield you control.) [Shield 2] (+2 Might while I'm a defender.) [Tank] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
FLAVOR_TEXT: "Tread carefully."

ABILITY_TEXT: 1 Power and 1 Order, Exhaust: Kill a friendly unit. Look at the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. You may play a unit from among them that has Might up to 1 more than the killed unit, ignoring its cost. Then recycle the rest.
FLAVOR_TEXT: There's always a bigger fish- sometimes a MUCH bigger fish.

ABILITY_TEXT: [Legion] - When you play me, ready me. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn) Other friendly units have +1 Might here.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "They will regret opposing me."

ABILITY_TEXT: Each player chooses 2 units, 2 gear, 2 runes, and 2 cards in their hands. Recycle the rest.
FLAVOR_TEXT: Equality isn't always equal.

ABILITY_TEXT: Exhaust: [Reaction] - [Add] 1 Order. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)
When another non-Recruit unit you control dies, play a 1 Might Recruit unit token into your base.
FLAVOR_TEXT: "I am the first of many."

FLAVOR_TEXT: "To strike against any of us is to strike against all of us!"
"Few earn the right to call themselves Trifarian."
"We are the future."

FLAVOR_TEXT: Dreams rarely linger, but the dreamer is still changed.
